main event: A B-52 was sighted at extremely high speed, approximately 1700 mph, about a mile away, climbing at a similar speed.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on March 9, 1961 at 0605Z., The object was described as light-colored and appeared to be about 30' in diameter., The observer reported the object climbing at a speed of about 1700 mph., The duration of the sighting was reported to be 5 minutes., There were no photographs included in the documentation.
sighted object: A B-52 flying at high speed
witness description: The witness provided details of the sighting in a questionnaire, indicating the object was high in the sky and not a standard aircraft.
